<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 14"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Shadow's Web](/Feats.aspx?ID=1754) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Monk" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=112" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 130 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
ki spells

**Requirements**
You are in Clinging Shadows Initiate.

</column>

---

You launch a wave of shadowy ki outward from your body, damaging your opponents and potentially binding them in place. You gain the [_shadow's web_](/Spells.aspx?ID=740) ki spell. Increase the number of Focus Points in your focus pool by 1.
name: Shadow's Web
requirement: You are in Clinging Shadows Initiate.
